name: CastleWeed
description: Playing as SnoopDog you climb to the top of the castle in a 3 long level game where you test your might with controlling your risk to get higher and higher without falling grasping onto obstacles naturally until you reach the very top in a complicate puzzle classic climber, and become the King of Weed.  Any time you can fall x amount of floors you can safe or close it all. Prepare your logic prepare your might focus jump on obstacles succeed getting to the very top the sky is the limit watch what awaits you :)
